infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show nearby government projects and enable location-based reporting.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture photos for project reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for project reports.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone for voice messages to i-maan AI assistant.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app needs access to speech recognition for voice commands to i-maan AI assistant.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow E-निरीक्षण to use your location to show nearby projects.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow E-निरीक्षण to access your photos to upload project evidence.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow E-निरीक्षण to access camera to capture project photos.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow CMD Transparency App to access microphone for voice messages to i-maan AI assistant.
